= spec =
== kprobe ==
	* kprobe 
		*  bpftrace -e 'kretprobe:do_sys_open { printf("returned: %d\n", retval); }'
		* sudo bpftrace --include linux/dcache.h  -e 'kretprobe:__d_lookup_rcu { if (comm == "test") { printf("%lx\n", ((struct dentry*)retval)->d_flags); }}'
== kstack ==
	1.  @[kstack()] = count();
